## aads keywords create

Create targeting keywords

```
aads keywords create [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --adgroup-id int      Ad group ID
      --bid string          Bid amount
      --campaign-id int     Campaign ID
      --from-json string    JSON input (inline, @file, or @- for stdin)
  -h, --help                help for create
      --match-type string   BROAD or EXACT (default "BROAD")
      --text string         Keyword text
```
